This is a mixed review... obviously i have a few hours in this game so i know the ins and outs of it. DbD is a fun game when you play survivor with friends and when you play killer against solo players.. see the issue? Lower ranks is actually the best to play against because you don't play against the try hards.. When you're playing killer you go against survivors with the "meta" perks such as dead hard, borrowed time, decisive strike and iron will. When you play survivor it feels like you need to have friends to make it fun.. when you DO have fun as either killer or survivor you just get complaints about how you play and what perks you have... It doesn't make the game fun to play. 

For exampe, I JUST played a 4 man SWF team (as high silver legion) and they brought a map offering, hatch offering, pink key, new parts and all players were red rank. I'm trying to get to red rank so i had to play dirty and not fun. Right away i headed towards the guy with the key, and basically camped and tunneled him. I got 2 kills but the other 2 made it to hatch. It wasn't fun for any of us. 

Moral of the story, if you get the game try to stay in lower ranks to have more fun and don't be a sweaty try hard.


**EDIT**
Just played after rank reset.. 3 games in a row i was face camped and tunneled. 

Highly recommend

Dead by Daylight is an extremely repetitive game, that brings breaths of fresh air every couple of months with new characters (survivors and killers) joining the roster. I have 600 hours on this game, which speaks volumes for how fun this game can be, but those hours are also spread across 5 years of the games release, which also speaks some volumes about the game itself, too. The game-play is very repetitive, with the same concept to winning a game, every game, much like any online game. However, with survivor perks not being overly important (again, people may say there is a meta of perks that should be used, but you can also quite easily escape with 0 perks), and some killers being redundantly useless as well as needing some change to their kit, the game lacks the variety that other multiplayer games may have. Such as league of legends having over 140 champions or Call of Duty having a vast variety of guns and attachments etc. The fun in this game, at least as a survivor perspective, comes with playing with your friends. The game is not really competitive, lacking a true reward/ranking system to aim for. This makes playing with friends great fun as you can casually play the game whilst mainly focusing on your conversation with your friends. With my limited knowledge of playing killer, it can be a frustrating thing at the best of times, with some abusive mechanics that favour survivors which probably contributes to the vast disparity in OP killers and redundant killers.

In my opinion, I would not play this game if my friends did not. I often quit the game and return when a friend invites me back to play. If you have friends to play, this game is a high 10/10 for the simplicity yet abundance of fun you can have. If you are solo, I would rate it so-low as 1/10. The gameplay is very, very, very un-interactive, and characters do not seem well balanced enough. In all cases, this game is definitely worth the £15 that it costs.

Игра настолько забагована, что разработчики покалечились физически

Сначала игра покажется вам интересной. Даже увлекательной. Но игра кишит багами и она жутко не оптимизирована и разработчики ничего не хотят с этим делать. Плюс ко всему разработчики не умеют в баланс игры. Оно им и не надо ибо конкурентов нету а отдел художников по скинам работает как печатный станок. Года два назад я мог её и порекомендовать но сейчас я строго не рекомендую тратить на неё свои деньги и время.

このゲームのここが糞
・基本的にキラーが不利で生存者が有利
・キラーが不利なマップは多いが生存者に不利なマップが無いと感じた
・特定のキラーのキャラが好きで始めた人には残念な話だがかなりの時間やりこまないと生存者の全滅すらキツイ
・初心者キラー相手にバリバリの赤帯や金帯の上の人間4人編成をぶつけてくる
・結果キラーが減り生存者が増えてマッチするまでの時間が延びる
・やりこんだ時間の差が物を言う（キラーや生存者のパーク構成や強いパークを持ってるかどうか）から始めたばかりの人間にはキツイ

いい所
・お金を掛ければ強くなるというゲームではないのが救い
・ホラーゲームというジャンルなだけあってちゃんとホラーゲーム（基本生存者有利）

The game is fun, and without a doubt entertaining. Each time I play, its never a shortage of laughs, screams, and panic. Its not deathly terrifying, but its just scary enough to keep you on the edge of your seat. The developers do an incredible job of keeping the game balanced while they add in new characters very frequently. Its a 10/10 game.
